channel.title: philosophy on Home
channel.description: Recent content in philosophy on Home

item.title: Myths Fading, Direction of Evolution
item.description: Remembering a concept from the book Sapiens (paraphrasing): Ape hierarchy only existed in small groups with a limit (150 or so) with a dominant leader (alpha). This applies to humans as well, but we were able so surpass the threshold with myths and better communication.
